Book Your Room Now!!Simple Introduction of IcelandIceland is a Nordic European island country situated at the confluence of the North Atlantic and Arctic Oceans, on the Mid-Atlantic Ridge. The country has a population of about 320,000 and a total area of 103,000 km2 (40,000Â sqÂ mi), which makes it the most sparsely populated country in Europe. The capital and largest city is ReykjavÃ­k. Iceland is located at the juncture of the North Atlantic and Arctic Oceans. The climate of Iceland's coast is subpolar oceanic. Iceland is a representative democracy and a parliamentary republic.TOP Tourist Attractions / Point of Interest of Iceland1. Blue Lagoon2. Gullfoss3. Hallgrimskirkja4. Golden Circle5. Askja6. Perlan7.
